alar2 allows to recover a failed VM. Various actions are available like: fstab, initrd and kernel. NOTE: use option --run-on-repair. See the docu for more details: https://github.com/Azure/repair-script-library/blob/master/src/linux/common/helpers/alar2/README.md. Please be aware that alar2 needs to be build on the recovery VM first. This takes about 2min. Please be patient.
